page.title: 13SOCIETIES
page.content: There are a wide range of clubs and societies in the village,catering for all ages.For the children there are two Brownie packs and a Guide group.There is also Meadowbrook swimming club,open in the summer.The Old Peoples lunch club meets once a week.The Garden Show society puts on a show once a year,and weekly talks in the winter.There is a Community Choir, based at Dartington Hall,an Astronomical Society,a Natural History Society,and a Chess Club.Regular Bingo sessions are held at the Village Hall, as well as Jumble Sales.The school and nursery have active PTA'S.The Shinners Bridge Centre puts on evening and day classes in a wide variety of activities.The village also has a number of sports teams,including cricket,tennis,football and skittles.
